verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother <S%G80><s%>, unto Philemon <S%G5371><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> dearly beloved <S%G27><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fellowlabourer <S%G4904><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> to our beloved <S%G27><s%> Apphia <S%G682><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Archippus <S%G751><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fellowsoldier <S%G4961><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of thee <S%G4675><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%>,

Hearing <S%G191><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> love <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>;

That <S%G3704><s%> the communication <S%G2842><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> effectual <S%G1756><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> joy <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> the bowels <S%G4698><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> are refreshed <S%G373><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, brother <S%G80><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%>, though I might be <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> bold <S%G3954><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to enjoin <S%G2004><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> that which is convenient <S%G433><s%>,

Yet for <S%G1223><s%> love's <S%G26><s%> sake I <S%G3870><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> beseech <S%G3870><s%> thee, being <S%G5607><s%> such an one <S%G5108><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> the aged <S%G4246><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

I beseech <S%G3870><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> Onesimus <S%G3682><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> I have begotten <S%G1080><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> bonds <S%G1199><s%>:

Which <S%G3588><s%> in time past <S%G4218><s%> was <S%G890><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> unprofitable <S%G890><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> profitable <S%G2173><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%>:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent again <S%G375><s%>: thou <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G1161><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that is <S%G5123><s%>, mine own <S%G1699><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%>:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> would <S%G1014><s%> have retained <S%G2722><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G1683><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> stead <S%G5228><s%> he might have ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the bonds <S%G1199><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> mind <S%G1106><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>; that <S%G3363><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> benefit <S%G18><s%> should <S%G5600><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it were of <S%G2596><s%> necessity <S%G318><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> willingly <S%G1595><s%> <S%G2596><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1223><s%> perhaps <S%G5029><s%> he <S%G5563><s%> therefore <S%G5124><s%> departed <S%G5563><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a season <S%G5610><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest receive <S%G568><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for ever <S%G166><s%>;

Not now <S%G3765><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%>, a brother <S%G80><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%>, specially <S%G3122><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> how much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>?
If <S%G1487><s%> thou count <S%G2192><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> a partner <S%G2844><s%>, receive <S%G4355><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> myself <S%G1691><s%>.

If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487><s%> he hath wronged <S%G91><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> oweth <S%G3784><s%> thee ought <S%G5100><s%>, put <S%G1677><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> on <S%G1677><s%> mine account <S%G1698><s%>;

I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> have written <S%G1125><s%> it with mine own <S%G1699><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will repay <S%G661><s%> it: albeit <S%G3363><s%> I do <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> thou owest <S%G4359><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> thine own self <S%G4572><s%> besides <S%G4359><s%>.

Yea <S%G3483><s%>, brother <S%G80><s%>, let <S%G3685><s%> me <S%G1473><s%> have joy <S%G3685><s%> of thee <S%G4675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>: refresh <S%G373><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Having confidence <S%G3982><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou wilt <S%G4160><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> more than <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5228><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> withal <S%G260><s%> prepare <S%G2090><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a lodging <S%G3578><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> I shall be given <S%G5483><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>.
There salute <S%G782><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> Epaphras <S%G1889><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> fellowprisoner <S%G4869><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>;
Marcus <S%G3138><s%>, Aristarchus <S%G708><s%>, Demas <S%G1214><s%>, Lucas <S%G3065><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> fellowlabourers <S%G4904><s%>.

The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>. Written <S%G1125><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Philemon <S%G5371><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> Onesimus <S%G3682><s%> a servant <S%G3610><s%>.
